Package model.pieces

Interface Piece

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractPiece, Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook
public interface Piece
A standard interface for a Piece object.

    getAllPossiblePositions(Chessboard board)

  • Method Details

    • getName

      Name getName()
      A standard getter for the name of the piece.
      Returns:
      the name of the piece.

    • getAllPossiblePositions

      List<Position> getAllPossiblePositions(Chessboard board)
      Given a chessboard, return a list of all possible positions that a piece can move to.
      Parameters:
      board - The chessboard that the piece is on.
      Returns:
      A list of all possible positions that the piece can move to.

      A getter for the position.

      A getter for the value of the piece.

    • isMoved

      boolean isMoved()
      A boolean that indicates if the piece was moved.
      Returns:
      the current state of the isMoved boolean.

    • setPosition

      A setter for the position of the piece.
      Parameters:
      position - the new Position.
